text:
Hey HS Themes Team!  Just something quick on the UX side to point out with the new beta.  Editing global modules is now a pretty poor experience.  The side nav isn’t extendable and since no CSS is included, the preview is quite confusing.

Has anyone else experience this, mentioned this??
Hey Kevin! Thanks for reporting. We actually just merged a fix for that today, so you should see the simple menu UI updated to be what it previously was in the next couple days.
Awesome <@U8THBCFC4>.  The push didn’t make it to my portal yet, but I’ll keep an eye out.
Perfect. Yeah, I believe we haven’t deployed to PROD yet, but you should see the update within the next day or so
